description: Provides summary information about the Amazon Web Services resource associations for the specified Amazon Connect instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: IntegrationAssociationId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the AppIntegration association.

nested_items.name: IntegrationAssociationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the AppIntegration association.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: IntegrationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the AppIntegration.

nested_items.name: SourceApplicationUrl
nested_items.description: The URL for the external application.

nested_items.name: SourceApplicationName
nested_items.description: The user-provided, friendly name for the external application.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.
